DOC.brief_summary: To assess effectiveness synthetic analogue prostacyclin postembolic residual pulmonary hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Use Ventavis Patients With Postembolic Residual Pulmonary Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patients pulmonary embolism undergone surgical treatment ( intravascular thrombolysis , catheter thrombus fragmentation ) Patients preserved thromboembolism pulmonary circulation system mean pressure pulmonary artery 25 mm Hg Patient sign inform consent . Mean pulmonary artery pressure surgical treatment le 25 mm Hg Age 75 year . Patients increase risk bleed include gastric ulcer 12 duodenal ulcer acute , hemorrhagic stroke . Severe coronary artery disease ( unstable angina , myocardial infarction within last 6 month ) . Acute heart failure CHF IV NYHA . Severe arrhythmia . Pregnancy , lactation . The presence severe diseases organ system may result death first year surgery .
